description: Single storey rear extension, front extension to existing side addition; alterations to windows at rear first floor level; insertion of 2no. windows to the side (south) elevation (Following demolition of the existing rear extension).
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:  OS GRID REF: TQ17048098 (Location Plan); PJ0137-EX-00 (Existing Site Plan); PJ0137-GA-EL-01 (Existing and Proposed Front Elevation); PJ0137-GA-EL-02 (Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation); PJ0137-GA-EL-03 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevation 1); PJ0137-GA-EL-04 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevation 2); PJ0137-GA-SC-01 (Existing and Proposed Sections); PJ0137-GA-P-01 (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan); PJ0137-GA-P-02 (Existing and Proposed First Floor Plan); Planning Statement prepared by ADL Planning Ltd
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building and shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.

| The (south) side facing windows to the first floor side elevation shall be obscure glazed non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.

REASON: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
